name: The Hardest Game Ever
description:
Pot ventured deep underground to find the most exotic flower he could, but now he's lost and needs to find the way out. Help Pot find his way through this precision platformer by conquering jumps and puzzles.



  • Hours of difficult precision platforming & puzzles
  • 3 different biomes
  • Beautiful art with immersive sounds and soundtrack
  • Mushrooms

The game features unique abilities that are used in unique ways and can be mastered over time: jumping, coyote time, and wall climbing.


Find phoenix feathers to guard your progress and set your respawn point.


Find keys to unlock doors, take shortcuts, and explore new paths.
